product_description: Adobo para Chorizo - Chorizo Marinade - Seasoning for Sausage.  Product is packaged in a plastic bucket seal with lid, 5 gallons. No UPC.  The label is read in parts: "*** Adobo para Chorizo *** Seasoning for Sausage *** Ingredients: Dried Chilies, vinegar, almonds, salt, pepper, garlic, cumin, clove, oregano, mint, cinnamon, saffron, cocoa, bay leaves, artificial food coloring (red and yellow)*** Jesmar Spices ***Portland, OR ***".
reason_for_recall: Undeclared SOY LECITHIN. The firm used chocolate bar in their Adobo para Chorizo Seasoning for Sausage and does not declare the chocolate bar's sub-ingredient soy lecithin in finished product label.
